us.title: Class Action Filed Against Novo Nordisk A/S (NVO) - March 25, 2025 Deadline to Join - Contact The Gross Law Firm
us.content: NEW YORK , March 17, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Gross Law Firm issues the following notice to shareholders of Novo Nordisk A/S (NYSE: NVO). Shareholders who purchased shares of NVO during the class period listed are encouraged to contact the firm regarding possible lead plaintiff appointment.

france.title: Toncoin (TON) Price: Surge Following Pavel Durov's Departure from France, $4.60 Next?
france.content: Toncoin (TON) price surged 20% after Telegram founder Pavel Durov received permission to temporarily leave France amid ongoing legal troubles.
